note: A template of a working ingress Organization App.

params.label: TQL
params.name: tql
params.note: A custom TQL query. When using TQL, other filter fields will be ignored. For details on writing TQL see https://training.threatconnect.com/learn/article/using-threatconnect-query-language-tql-kb-article.

params.label: Indicator Types
params.name: indicator_types
params.note: The ThreatConnect Indicator types on which to filter.

params.label: ThreatConnect Owners
params.name: owners
params.note: The ThreatConnect Owner(s) on which to filter.

params.label: Include Tags
params.name: tags
params.note: Indicators must have at least one of these Tags to be exported. Query logic is "OR".

params.label: Maximum False Positive Count
params.name: max_false_positive
params.note: Indicators must have fewer than this number of False Positives to be exported.

params.label: Minimum Confidence Rating
params.name: minimum_confidence
params.note: Indicators must have at least this Confidence Rating to be exported. Enter 0-100 or leave blank for Any.

params.label: Minimum Threat Rating
params.name: minimum_rating
params.note: Indicators must have at least this Threat Rating to be exported. Enter 1-5 or leave blank for Any.

params.label: Minimum ThreatAssess Score
params.name: minimum_threatassess_score
params.note: If set, the Minimum Threat Rating and Minimum Confidence Rating fields are ignored. Enter 0-1000 or leave blank for Any.

params.label: Last Modified
params.name: last_modified
params.note: Data modified since this date will be included on first run. Thereafter, the date will be automatically updated each time the job successfully completes.
